TopicTitle: Usefull KSP stuff #1 - Small and Cheap Escape Pod!

Articles.Content:
So after all theese large, expensive and theese escape pods which only can carry 1 kerbal, i decided i needed something new.

So i came up with this, a 2 kerbal carrying small escape pod.

The Pod can deorbit from almost everywhere between a 70.000km to a 500.000km orbit.

If you look after the download file i'm sorry to say that there is none because mediafire have been down all day.

Anyways i'd love some feedback, and tell me what you guys want me to do next!
